Lake Mburo National Park is in
Fish Eagle, Topi, Impala, Warthog, Vervet Monkey, Plains Zebra, Crocodile, Hippo, Lion, Oribi, Lelwel Hartebeest, olive baboon, leopard
Private vehicle is the only reasonable way to reach the park.
,located in Kampala, can help to arrange tours, transportation, and accommodation for the park.
Entrance fees are required but the cost is minimal.
There are very few places to buy food.  It would be wise to bring some supplies.

Some limited cabins and dorms exist.  Try to book ahead.
Mhingo Lodge is a comfortable safari camp, built just on the edge of the park. Deluxe safari tents with thatched roofs, attached bathroom with shower and toilet. Central dining room and bar. Swimming pool. Horse-back safaris. Contact www.uganda-wildlife-photographic-safaris.com for safaris to this location.
There are designated spots for camping
Trekking into the backcountry will require the hiring of a guide.
